short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension PokéDex for looking up your favorite pokemon!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the ultimate Chrome extension for Pokémon enthusiasts! With our extension, you can easily look up any Pokémon by name and instantly access their comprehensive stats. Whether you're a seasoned trainer or just starting your journey, this tool provides a quick and convenient way to explore the details of your favorite Pokémon. Catch 'em all with ease using our Pokémon Stats Lookup extension – download now and enhance your Pokémon experience!
